Raw: On Monday next, November 25, at 3.15 p.m., the speakers will be Mrs. Pankhurst, Mrs. Israel Zangwill, and Mrs. Mansell-Moullin.
The meeting at the Steinway Hall on Thursday, November 28, at eight p.m., will be addressed by Miss Barrett, Miss Evelyn Sharp, and Mrs. Dagen.
Members' meeting, Wednesday, Nov. 27, at 8 p.m., at 2, Vittoria-walk.
Mr. Pethick Lawrence will speak at St. Peter's Hall on Tuesday, December 3, at 8 p.m.
Next meeting will therefore be on Tuesday, Nov. 26, 8 p.m.
Please note debate at 24, Sussex Villas, Hove, Thursday, Nov. 21, 8.15 p.m. "Are Militant Methods Justifiable?"
Will all members help with canvassing for Town Hall meeting, Nov. 29?
Two public meetings on "White Slave Traffic" will be held on Friday, Nov. 29, at 7 p.m. and 8 p.m.
One week before Town Hall meeting.
Mr. Charles Grey, M.P.U., will visit Bath on Dec. 5, and a welcome meeting is being arranged.
Miss Hicks has promised to speak at Grand Hotel "At Home," Monday, Dec. 2.
